title: Digital Health Literacy Competency Enhancement Course for Online Health Information

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Experience in Health Information Retrieval
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, cultivating critical evaluation and application skills for online health information targeting working professionals

learning_goals: Evaluate the credibility of diverse online health information sources based on three criteria (source, evidence, recency)
Share health information verification methods with peer learners in digital literacy discussion forums and provide meaningful feedback at least five times
Design and practice at least two online information search strategies applicable to real health-related problem situations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
